flawed_nl_solution:
In one year, the rancher will have 200 + 200/2 = 200 + 100 = <<200+200/2=300>>300 cows.
In two years, the rancher will have 300 + 300/2 = 300 + 150 = <<300+300/2=405>>405 cows.
#### 405

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 450, not 405. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
